src:
Ananya Panday shares a frame with Chunky Pandey and Farah Khan; captions, 'Posing with Tony Stark and the hottest principal EVER!'
06 Nov 2019, 22:04 by TIMESOFINDIA.COM
Ananya Panday marked her debut with Punit Malhotra's 'Student of the year 2'. The actress received appreciation and love for her performance in the film. The young starlet is also known for her classic fashion sense. She keeps her fans updated by sharing her looks for the event and day to day activities on her Instagram account.
Today, she took took the photo-sharing to post a picture with her dad Chunky Pandey and Farah Khan. In the photo, it can be seen Chunky sporting moustache and beard similar to Robert Downey Jr's Marvel character Tony Stark aka Iron Man. And Ananya's caption for the post says the same. She wrote, " Posing with Tony Stark and the hottest principal EVER!!! Thank you for having us @farahkhankunder ❤️🤩"
Check out the post here:



Soon Farah commented on Ananya's post and wrote, "My clever girl with the most irritating student ever... chunky" while Ananya's 'Pati Patni Aur Woh' co-star also found Chunky's look similar to Stark, she commented, "Omg same tony stark 💕".
The 'Housefull 4' start also said, "Ha ha ha Tony Stark and #irongirls 😍🤩💖 congratulations @ananyapanday for winning tonight 😛😝😜🕺💃" in the comment section.



Meanwhile, on the work front, Ananya will be next seen in Mudassar Aziz's 'Pati Patni Aur Woh' co-starring Kartik Aaryan and Bhumi. The film has been slated for December release.
